text: The studio is well equipped and the coaches are really nice and helpful is giving tips on every progression and making sure we get the right form and working on the right muscles. Overall really enjoyed working out there!!

title: BFT Pioneer
name: Vanna W
text:
BFT Pioneer is one of the most friendiest and approachable coaches around! They are well-equipped with knowledge to teach members and motivate you during sessions :) Not only that, coaches are also certified and trained - so you know you are in good hands. üòâ

Shower facilities are available to wash up right after a sweaty workout üí™üöø And affordable isotonic and protein drinks to go.

Additionally, the coaches diligently communicate class schedules, workout and tips via their Instagram page @bft_pioneer and Telegram Channels for members. They show their commitment to members by building rapport with members in-and-out of studio, and value our satisfaction at the studio.

BFT Pioneer, similar to the other fellow member's reviews here, is my first group-style class I've sign up for. Generally members are welcoming & passionate to share their fitness knowledge and workout together. So don't be afraid if you are new and have no prior experience gyming! Come enjoy and have fun working out together ‚ù§Ô∏è

Highly recommend to anyone interested to sign up for their trials or promotional try outs for the month!

title: BFT Pioneer
name: Dasmond Teh
text:
BFT Pioneer is by far best BFT I have been to. Boasting of an astonishing 200+ sq ft, it is safe to say that this is one the most spacious BFT around. The coaches are also very friendly and professional; always looking out for all of our heart rates to ensure we are pushing ourselves and improving progressively. They also diligently sanitise all the equipment between each sessions upkeep the hygiene and cleanliness for all the users. Location wise is fantastic; with various different eateries in the vicinity and ample parking spaces. They also do lend out their heart rate monitors for free for trial users! Major plus points all in all , you will definitely not regret joining BFT Pioneer!

Ps. Feel free to quote my name if you join if this review helped you üòä

title: BFT Pioneer
name: Y Z
text: Well equipped and clean fitness studio, friendly and passionate trainers who will guide members on the best techniques. A community of like-minded fitness members who encourage each other to do their best. Enjoyed my 2 week trial with BFT Pioneer. üëç

title: BFT Pioneer
name: Cindy Tay
text: Been a member since its launch in Sep 23. Genuine fun with coaches and a growing community of like-minded people who comes with positive vibe and a desire to push one another to achieve more. Thanks Leo and Pat!

title: BFT Pioneer
name: Jamie Loh
text: 3 months since I joined BFT Pioneer . very positive and encouraging environment . my fitness level started from ground zero here with no knowledge of any equipment so , yes recommended to come here for any level of fitness

title: BFT Pioneer
name: Rahayu Razak
text:
As someone new and trying to get fit. BFT was a good start for me. The trainers were friendly and helpful - Ensuring we have the right form and not get injured.

Leo and Patricia is super friendly and they are great.

If you wanna sweat it out and need motivation to do so. This BFT, especially Pioneer branch is the place to go.

Will be back soon!

title: BFT Pioneer
name: Hong Woon Soh
text: Best BFT outlet I have been to so far! Owners are incredibly friendly. Coaches are professional and will push you along during the session. Just completed my 2 weeks trial and am looking forward to future sessions. If you want to trial BFT, please consider this outlet as they provide Heart Rate Monitor as well, which allows you to follow their system closely. This is the first outlet which I know that actually provides the HRM during trial period. COME DOWN AND TRY NOW.

title: Fernvale Hawker Centre & Market
name: Toh Bee Leng
text: Spacious, clean and airy. Many famous stalls. I enjoyed eating here.

title: Fernvale Hawker Centre & Market
name: DHIRAJ BODKHE
text: Newly opened with a spacious, airy atmosphere that doesn‚Äôt feel cramped. Offers a wide variety of food, making it one of the better spots for evening or weekend meals.

title: Fernvale Hawker Centre & Market
name: Dan Raj
text: A very cosy atmosphere with a very clean environment.. convenience of travel with Fernvale LRT beside.. I love to dine here..‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Fernvale Hawker Centre & Market
name: Alex Ong
text: Fair share of hawker food.

title: Fernvale Hawker Centre & Market
name: Edmund Lee
text: A bright lit hawker centre w a tv showing cartoons at the kids corner. Good for families w young kids. Despite the hot weather, the operator did it's best to cool the entire hawker centre with a few giant fan. My boys fav is the ice jelly cocktail from the desert stall. While my fav is the Korean kimchi ramen w pork. Nice tasty kimchi couple w d tasty soup and noodle. 1 of the best that I have ever eaten. The carrot cake and the prawn noodle are the usual weekend breakfast for my wife and me. Overall a nice hawker centre to satisfy your local food craving.

title: Fernvale Hawker Centre & Market
name: Ars 3276
text:
This hawker is huge airy clean spacious. That's the summary of it.

Plenty of parking at B1.
Food wise, it also seems to be the franchise or branches of other famous stalls in Sg.
But sadly they only remember to bring the name but not the recipe n taste.
We felt the taste wise of some food we tried was way off and not nice at all.

Guess maybe only 3-4 nice stalls here at max.
Hearsay there's been quite a number of changes in stalls. It's. Great place for the residents here for sure. Saw a few blks which are just next to this, lucky fellows.
